PAGE_DESCRIPTION: crowdsrcd is a crowd sourced webcam for all the places that do not have a webcam. We need your contribution to keep the image as current as possible. The last three approved submissions will be shown publicly. Crowdsrcd is ad-free and does not use any cookies. It does use third-party services (Bootstrap, OpenStreetMap).
SUBMIT_DESCRIPTION: You can upload a new photo here and add it to the CrowdCam history for this place. Thank you for your contribution.
FILE_UPLOAD_SUCCESS_TOAST: Thank you for your contribution. It has been uploaded successfully and is awaiting approval by the administrator.
